ExportResources.description: Contains the genetic code sequence of a Kavat.
ExportResources.name: KAVAT GENETIC CODE

ExportResources.description:
Copies the dominant genes of a pet onto the template. 
This can then be used to increase the chances that traits from the original pet will carry across to a newborn clone.
ExportResources.name: GENETIC CODE TEMPLATE

ExportResources.description: This device facilitates the growth of a Kubrow clone, from birth to puppyhood.
ExportResources.name: INCUBATOR POWER CORE

ExportResources.description: Records the genetic memory and DNA sequence of a Kubrow, allowing it to be reconstructed in the Incubator.
ExportResources.name: NAI-ZHEN KUBROW COLLAR

ExportResources.description: Contains 6 DNA Stabilizers to maintain the health of a Kubrow.
ExportResources.name: DNA STABILIZERS

ExportResources.description: An army composed of vapor-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for one conflict.
ExportResources.name: VAPOR SPECTER REGIMENT

ExportResources.description: An army composed of force-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for three conflicts.
ExportResources.name: FORCE SPECTER REGIMENT

ExportResources.description: An army composed of cosmic-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for four conflicts.
ExportResources.name: COSMIC SPECTER REGIMENT

ExportResources.description: An army composed of phase-level Specter clones to be used in defense of the clan's Solar Rail. This Specter army will persist for two conflicts.
ExportResources.name: PHASE SPECTER REGIMENT

ExportResources.longDescription: Torn from the bile duct of a fallen Hemocyte.
ExportResources.name: HEMOCYTE CYSTOLITH

ExportResources.longDescription: One of the rarest, most valuable Eidolon shards. Flawless.
ExportResources.name: BRILLIANT EIDOLON SHARD

ExportResources.longDescription: A shard of unmatched beauty and power.
ExportResources.name: RADIANT EIDOLON SHARD

ExportResources.longDescription: The most prized part of an Eidolon. Jewelry created from an Eidolon shard is most prized in Cetus.
ExportResources.name: EIDOLON SHARD

ExportResources.description: The talon on a condroc's wing is is sharp enough to tear through bone.
ExportResources.name: CONDROC WING

ExportResources.description: Strange stone lifeforms that call the Plains home. They are a rare find, clustering together, floating above a patch of ground they've taken an inexplicable interest in. They are an enigma.
ExportResources.name: CETUS WISP

ExportResources.description: This hardy fruit is thick-skinned to withstand harsh conditions, concealing a mouthful of sweet pulp within.
ExportResources.name: MAPRICO

ExportResources.description: The sinew from the Kuaka's spinal claws can be tanned to make a resilient and flexible leather.
ExportResources.name: KUAKA SPINAL CLAW

ExportResources.description: A noxious mix of polyssachharides and long-chain polymers, Grokdrul is a standard chemical used in Grineer manufacturing.
ExportResources.name: GROKDRUL

ExportResources.description: A valuable mineral found on the Plains.
ExportResources.name: IRADITE

ExportResources.description: Used by the Nistlebrush to trap and kill prey.
ExportResources.name: NISTLEPOD

ExportResources.description: An integral part of Vomvalysts and Teralysts, the exact function of this... device? Organ? is uncertain.
ExportResources.name: INTACT SENTIENT CORE

ExportResources.description: An integral part of Vomvalysts and Teralysts, the exact function of this... device? Organ? is uncertain.
ExportResources.name: FLAWLESS SENTIENT CORE

ExportResources.description: An integral part of Vomvalysts and Teralysts, the exact function of this... device? Organ? is uncertain.
ExportResources.name: EXCEPTIONAL SENTIENT CORE

ExportResources.description: Harvested by the Ostron as a catalyst used in their synthetics.
ExportResources.name: CHARC ELECTROPLAX

ExportResources.description: Used in Ostron remedies to purify toxins.
ExportResources.name: GOOPOLLA SPLEEN

ExportResources.description: An ingredient used in Ostron cooking and medicines.
ExportResources.name: MURKRAY LIVER

ExportResources.description: These will often adorn ceremonial garb or as a reagent for synthetics.
ExportResources.name: SHARRAC TEETH

ExportResources.description: Ground into a powder this substance can make fires burn hotter for a brief amount of time.
ExportResources.name: KARKINA ANTENNA

ExportResources.description: The bones of the Mawfish are carved by the Ostron to produce onaments and tools.
ExportResources.name: MAWFISH BONES

ExportResources.description: The poison is used by the Ostrons to cure leather and as a reagent to produce an embalming fluid.
ExportResources.name: KHUT-KHUT VENOM SAC

ExportResources.description: Once cleaned and tanned this organ can be turned into a durable leather.
ExportResources.name: YOGWUN STOMACH

ExportResources.description: The Ostron boil these into a jelly which forms a strong adhesive when it dries.
ExportResources.name: TRALOK EYES

ExportResources.description: The horn of a Mortus Lungfish is ground down into a powder and used by the Ostrons in herbal remedies.
ExportResources.name: MORTUS HORN

ExportResources.longDescription: Used as a source of food and to create bait for predatory fish.
ExportResources.name: FISH MEAT

ExportResources.longDescription: Used to create absolvents that purify gems.
ExportResources.name: FISH OIL

ExportResources.longDescription: A material used in tailoring clothes and cultivating synthetics.
ExportResources.name: FISH SCALES

ExportResources.description: This thick shell is used by Ostrons to manufacture tools and weapons.
ExportResources.name: SERAM BEETLE SHELL

ExportResources.description: An Ostron delicacy.
ExportResources.name: NORG BRAIN

ExportResources.description: Ostrons extract the toxin and apply it to their weapons when hunting animals.
ExportResources.name: CUTHOL TENDRILS

ExportResources.description: Discharges electricity from luminous glands along its flanks to stun its prey.

ExportResources.description: Displays blood-spattered pattern on its scales and has its ribs exposed through open cavities along both flanks. When predators approach it lies still at the bottom of the sand banks, disguised as a carcass in hopes of being ignored.
ExportResources.name: MORTUS LUNGFISH

ExportResources.description: Synthetic fibers and a molded foam insole were the basis for what was once a robust and comfortable combat boot. Now, it's a home for tiny aquatic organisms.
ExportResources.name: BOOT

ExportResources.description: The Glappid is a scavenger that feasts on the remains of dead fish. It has formed a symbiotic bond with the Seram Beetle which extracts and feeds upon any toxins ingested by the Glappid.
ExportResources.name: GLAPPID

ExportResources.description: This fish inhabits the shallows and feeds of crabs and other small crustaceans. When threatened it forces air into its brain to give it the impression of being much bigger than it normally is.

ExportResources.name: FERSTEEL ALLOY

ExportResources.description: Each vial is produced by the painstaking expression of billions of rare, ocean-vent dwelling microorganisms.
ExportResources.name: NITAIN EXTRACT

ExportResources.description: Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.
ExportResources.name: ALLOY PLATE

ExportResources.description: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Beta counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Beta Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.
ExportResources.name: ALPHA CORRUPTOR

ExportResources.description: Archive detailing the locations of hidden Archwing technology
ExportResources.name: OROKIN ARCHIVE

ExportResources.description: Void based radioactive resource that decays every day it is out of the void.
ExportResources.name: ARGON CRYSTAL

ExportResources.description: One part of a long lost mathematical proof.
ExportResources.name: PROOF FRAGMENT

ExportResources.description: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Alpha counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Alpha Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.
ExportResources.name: BETA CORRUPTOR

ExportResources.description: Coordinate used to locate the Lephantis.
ExportResources.name: LEPHANTIS NAV COORDINATE

ExportResources.description: Various electronic components.
ExportResources.name: CIRCUITS

ExportResources.name: /Lotus/Language/Items/ClanCreator

ExportResources.description: Autonomy processor for Robotics. A Corpus design.
ExportResources.name: CONTROL MODULE

ExportResources.description: Usually found in extreme sub-zero environments, Cryotic instantly freezes anything it contacts.
ExportResources.name: CRYOTIC

ExportResources.description:
Grants access to the Simulacrum.

In the Simulacrum you can face mimeographs of enemies you have fully researched with the Codex.
ExportResources.name: SIMULACRUM ACCESS KEY

ExportResources.description: Intercepted encrypted fragment of Grineer communications.
ExportResources.name: TETHRA DATA FRAGMENTS

ExportResources.description: A gas found solely on the plains of Eidolon, refined to its purest form.
ExportResources.name: BREATH OF THE EIDOLON

ExportResources.description: Distilled fuel for stims.
ExportResources.name: SYNTHULA

ExportResources.description: Alloy pellets used in Grineer manufacturing.
ExportResources.name: FERRITE

ExportResources.description: This shape-altering component is fundamental to Orokin construction. Allows you to change the polarity of a mod slot on a Warframe, Companions or Weapon and then resets their affinity to Unranked. This can only be used on Level 30 Warframes, Companions and Weapons.
ExportResources.name: FORMA

ExportResources.description: Soft metal used in microelectronics and energy weapons.
ExportResources.name: GALLIUM

ExportResources.description: Coordinate used to locate Councilor Vay Hek.
ExportResources.name: VAY HEK NAV COORDINATE

ExportResources.description: Nav coordinates of Alad V's Infestation Research Ship
ExportResources.name: MUTALIST ALAD V NAV COORDINATE

ExportResources.description: A mysterious red fluid coveted by the Grineer Queens.
ExportResources.name: KUVA

ExportResources.description: Chance for each scan with the Synthesis Scanner to count as two scans.
ExportResources.name: CROSS-MATRIX WIDGET

ExportResources.description: Recharges Synthesis Scanner charges.
ExportResources.name: SOL-BATTERY WIDGET

ExportResources.description: Reduces the time required to scan a target with the Synthesis Scanner.
ExportResources.name: VECTOR-THREAD WIDGET

ExportResources.description: /Lotus/Language/Items/LimboCodeDesc
ExportResources.name: /Lotus/Language/Items/LimboCodeName

ExportResources.description: This device is used to bypass Orokin encryptions.
ExportResources.name: OROKIN CIPHER

ExportResources.description: An amorphous solid. Possibly Orokin technology.
ExportResources.name: MORPHICS

ExportResources.description: Fibrous technocyte tumour. Handle Infested tissue with caution.
ExportResources.name: NANO SPORES

ExportResources.description: Coordinate used to locate lost ships.
ExportResources.name: NAV COORDINATE

ExportResources.description: Implanted neural-link for controlling augmentations. Grineer design.
ExportResources.name: NEURAL SENSORS

ExportResources.description: Biotech sensor organ harvested from Infested entities.
ExportResources.name: NEURODES

ExportResources.description: Produced by a Fomorian’s power core, these particles only appear on or around planets where a Fomorian is present.
ExportResources.name: OMEGA ISOTOPE

ExportResources.description: Orokin modification technology used to super-charge weaponry. Doubles the available Mod Capacity on a Weapon.
ExportResources.name: OROKIN CATALYST

ExportResources.description: Ancient energy cell from the Orokin era.
ExportResources.name: OROKIN CELL

ExportResources.description: Reactor used to super-charge Warframes. Doubles the available Mod Capacity on a Warframe, Archwing, and Companions.
ExportResources.name: OROKIN REACTOR

ExportResources.description: Oxium is a rare lighter than air alloy of Orokin origin.
ExportResources.name: OXIUM

ExportResources.description: A disgusting nanite-infested tissue mass.
ExportResources.name: PLASTIDS

ExportResources.description: A hard, thermoplastic casing. Manufactured by Corpus.
ExportResources.name: POLYMER BUNDLE

ExportResources.description: Currency exchanged for Prime components and used to purchase items from the Void Trader.
ExportResources.name: OROKIN DUCATS

ExportResources.description: A jagged crystalline ore. Gives off radiant energy.
ExportResources.name: RUBEDO

ExportResources.description: High value metals collected from war salvage.
ExportResources.name: SALVAGE

ExportResources.description: Injected into a Fomorian Reactor this corruptor will imbalance the fuels. Critically imbalanced reactors will eventually implode, destroy the ship. Slow but effective, recommended for Solo Tenno.
ExportResources.name: STABLE CORRUPTOR

ExportResources.description: This rare metal is foreign to the Origin System and can only be found in asteroids that have made the long journey from other stars.
ExportResources.name: TELLURIUM

ExportResources.description: Fuses with a Warframe to create an additional Exilus Mod Slot.
ExportResources.name: EXILUS ADAPTER

ExportResources.name: DELTA BEACON

ExportResources.description: Behold, the singular vision of a great artist and the life’s work of a master craftsmen. An artifact so refined, so imbued with the finest material that it has no equal in this system. This is the plinth that all others aspire to be. This is Pedestal Prime.
ExportResources.name: PEDESTAL PRIME

ExportResources.description: Adds the Archwing Launcher to the foundry
ExportResources.name: ARCHWING LAUNCHER SEGMENT

ExportResources.description:
Upgrades the Orbiter's Foundry with the following features:

- Allows construction of Landing Craft
- Allows construction of Air Support Charges

Equip Air Support Charges in your Loadout's Gear
ExportResources.name: LANDING CRAFT FOUNDRY SEGMENT

ExportResources.description: Allows the Incubator to breed Kavats.
ExportResources.name: KAVAT INCUBATOR UPGRADE SEGMENT

ExportResources.description:
Upgrades the Orbiter's Incubator with the following features:

- Stasis Recovery reduced to 30 mins
- Stasis Recovery can be rushed with Credits
- Pets are placed into Stasis if they become mortally ill 
- Egg incubation reduced by a day 
- Stabilizers last twice as long
ExportResources.name: NUTRIO INCUBATOR UPGRADE SEGMENT
